title: Visualize High-Dimensional Data with MDS
description: Multi-dimensional scaling (MDS) is a technique used to visualize high-dimensional data in a lower dimensional space (usually 2D or 3D) while preserving the pairwise distances between the data points as much as possible. It is often used in exploratory data analysis and visualization.

meta.title: Visualize High-Dimensional Data with MDS
meta.description: Explore the power of multi-dimensional scaling (MDS) to visualize complex data in a 2D or 3D space.
meta.keywords: machine learning, python, dimensionality reduction, data visualization, exploratory data analysis, scikit-learn, machine learning playground, scikit-learn playground, multi dimensional scaling
